title: WeightWatchers Offers Digital Program Discount
description: We care about your health and well-being. That’s why we have partnered with WW (WeightWatchers) to offer a discount for Paramount’s fully insured members. Eligible fully insured members can sign up for WW’s Digital program or Unlimited Workshops + Digital program for 50% off the retail price . Members must be at least 18 years old to sign up for a WW program.

title: Paramount Dental Launches Tele-Dental Services For Members
description: Paramount Dental is pleased to announce the launch of tele-dental services for members. The new service will allow members to access a dentist online from the comfort of their own homes at no additional cost.

title: Marketplace Five Star Rating
description: Paramount's Health Insurance Marketplace© plans received 5 out of 5 stars for quality from the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS) for the 2023 plan year.

title: Paramount Elite’s (HMO) Medicare Plans Receive High Star Rating from CMS
description: We are thrilled to share that for 2023 Paramount’s Medicare Advantage plans, called Paramount Elite (HMO), received 4.5 out 5 stars from the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS).

title: Paramount Elite Medicare adds McLaren St. Luke’s and Mercy Health to provider network
description: To ensure that Paramount Elite (HMO/PPO) Medicare Advantage members have easy access to their favorite hospitals and providers in northwest Ohio and southeast Michigan, Paramount recently added two more local health systems to the provider network: McLaren St. Luke’s hospital and WellCare Physicians Group and Mercy Health hospitals and medical group providers.

title: It’s Open Enrollment for Medicare until December 7
description: It’s that time of year again – Medicare Annual Enrollment Period (AEP) from Oct. 15 – Dec. 7. It’s important to review your plan every year to make sure that it still meets your health and well-being needs.

title: Paramount Has Moved
description: Paramount Insurance has moved to 300 Madison Ave., Suite 270, Toledo, Ohio 43604. You can now find us in The Plaza in Downtown Toledo. We will no longer be operating in the 1901 Indian Wood Circle location in Maumee, Ohio.

title: New for Paramount Employer-Sponsored and Marketplace Health Plans
See a doctor from the comfort of your home
description: Did you know you can have a telehealth doctor visit from the comfort of your home? You may be able to see your doctor without leaving your home or workplace. For a telehealth visit, you will use your telephone, smart phone, or tablet to have a call or video visit with your doctor.

title: 7 strategies for cutting back or quitting drinking
description: This April, during Alcohol Awareness Month, Paramount encourages you to learn about the dangers of drinking too much.
